locations.name: Rocket Pad
locations.ability: After turn 4, give cards on the winning side here +1 Power.

items.title: Grand Arena
items: Choose your Champion from a roster of eight iconic characters, then battle using unique decks and powerful skill cards tailored to each hero.

items.name: Zabu
changes: 1/2 – On Reveal: Give each 4-Cost card in your deck -1 Cost.

items.name: Bullseye
changes: 3/3 – Activate: Discard all cards that cost 1 or less from your hand. Afflict that many different enemy cards with -2 Power.

items.name: Negasonic Teenage Warhead
changes: 3/3 – After an enemy card is played here, destroy it. (once per game)
3/3 – After an enemy character is played here, destroy it. (once per game)

items.name: Mirage
changes: 2/2 – On Reveal: Copy the card that costs the least from your opponent’s hand into your hand. Give it +2 Power.
2/3 – On Reveal: Copy the character that costs the least from your opponent’s hand into your hand. Give it +2 Power

items.name: Marvel Boy
changes: 3/1 – End of turn: Give 3 of your 1-Cost cards +1 Power.

items.name: Jennifer Kale
changes: 2/2 – Activate: Next turn, you get +1 Energy.

items.name: Doctor Doom 2099
changes: 4/3 End of Turn: Add a DoomBot 2099 to a random location if you played (exactly) 1 card.
